name: Two Doors - Horror Escape Game
description:
Welcome to your worst nightmare!

You are stuck in an abandoned house. The lighting is dim and eerie. The walls are decaying, and it feels like someone or something is looking at you. You can feel the heaviness of energy surrounding you, making it hard to breathe.

You must escape this place. You must survive. If you don't leave this house, you'll be trapped with evil spirits forever. The spirits here are angry and restless, and you are now in their world. 

In front of you are two doors. Which door do you choose?

Disclaimer: 
Don't play this game if you are easily scared. This app includes in app purchase to remove ads.
